price: “Да, кратко сте провели”, рећи ће им се, “да сте само знали!”
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
